elements.label: Temptation: Change
elements.description: On certain nights before the audience, there is the wing-lift of something more. What more could I become? [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

elements.label: Change: Leaf
elements.description: I tremble when the wind comes. The veins beneath my surface are apparent. I always carry a bead of malachite next to my skin. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

elements.label: Change: Pearl
elements.description: My skin is peeling in patches, and beneath it I am darker, but my eyes are brighter. I carry a sea-pearl in a secret place. Sometimes at night I hear the sea; sometimes in the morning my sheets are marked with blood. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

elements.label: Change: Antumbra
elements.description: I have grown as dark as I ever will. Shadows are my company, and my footfall is a whisper. I wear a ring set with jet, but I keep the stone turned inwards, in my palm invisible. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

elements.label: Change: Stigma
elements.description: My darkness has paled and all my colours are bleached. New lobes bud about my most receptive elements. I am dewed with secrets. I carry a scolecite prism tucked beneath my pale tongue. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

elements.label: Change: Pupil
elements.description: The whites of my eyes are yellow, and a new integument has developed along my limbs to sheath me before the final change. In private, I wear a gold toe-ring, and ear-rings of gold and topaz, but they are not to be seen. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory, if you upgrade it far enough. Devote enough effort to your dances, and you'll find the next step.]

elements.label: Change: Ivory
elements.description: My bones are different. They carry the tale of what is lost. If I do not survive, they will be my tale, and someone will wear fragments of my ivory to warm against their skin. [This card will allow you to win a Change victory.]

elements.label: Guise: Viper
elements.description: The Viper coils where the sea folds itself against the land. I must find a place of power at the water's edge.  Perhaps Sulochana can help, if I bring her secrets about other places.  [Some part of you can roam in serpent-shape. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Guise: Cat
elements.description: The Cat walks in the night by the river where the black flax grows. [Some part of you can roam in cat-shape. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Guise: Fox
elements.description: The Fox wanders the mountain meadows, seeking the flower-maker's touch. [Some part of you can roam in fox-shape. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Guise: Eagle
elements.description: The Eagle travels the sky's road, and here is what it sees: in Miah was the first Roost, where the powers of the air first exchanged their secrets. [Some part of you can roam in eagle-shape. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Guise: Dove
elements.description: The Dove remembers when all others forget. [Some part of you can roam as a pale bird. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Guise: Boar
elements.description: In this form, I will surrender myself to one who holds the key of the Kingskin Gate. [Some part of you can roam as a wild black beast.]

elements.label: Instar: Silent
elements.description: In a silent house beside the sea, in a borrowed skin, we will seek the second change. I must find a place of power at the water's edge. Perhaps Sulochana can help, if I bring her secrets about other places. [Some part of you can roam in viper-shape. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Instar: Creeping
elements.description: Among the stones where the black beast burrows, behind the mask of eyes, we will seek the third change. [Some part of you can roam in cat-shape. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Instar: Russet
elements.description: In the high places where the air is temptation, we will seek the fourth change. [Some part of you can roam in fox-shape. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Instar: Far-Travelling
elements.description: In Miah, where the Centipede saw all that might yet come, we will seek the fifth change. [Some part of you can roam in eagle-shape. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Instar: Avid
elements.description: In the far place where they remember the Sun, I will bring my borrowed hate for the sixth change. [Some part of you can roam in wolf-shape. Send it to accompany your followers to a place where it can perform the dance you must dance. If you have problems finding the place, talk to Sulochana about Secret Histories.]

elements.label: Imago
elements.description: For the final change, I will pass the Door in the Wood. Medusa's sacrifice is always a virgin red deer, and so I will pass the door as a hind. [Into night's circle you fly.]

elements.label: Guise: Imago
elements.description: My spirit will leave my body as a great horned beast. To be a sacrifice? [What is within, without; what is without, within.]

elements.label: Garments, Surrendered
elements.description: The Malachite has taught me that the naked self is not the true self, but it is less of a lie. [In the Season of Ambitions, this can upgrade your Change desire.]

elements.label: Integument, Surrendered
elements.description: The Twins and the Serpent war, and in that war I have learnt how pain can be a gate.

elements.label: Steps, Surrendered
elements.description: The Velvet has taught me that what is revealed must first be hidden, for its revelation to be of any consequence. I have given up my footsteps.

elements.label: Hues, Surrendered
elements.description: The Flowermaker has given me what all desire, and taken my colours from me.

elements.label: Sight, Surrendered
elements.description: I have given my eyes to the Vagabond, and through them I shall see what she would see: the road to the red change.

elements.label: Bones, Surrendered
elements.description: The Elegiast has taught me to remember, in the last part of me to change. I'll carry that lesson past the Kingskin Gate.

elements.label: Garments, Surrendered
elements.description: The Ring-Yew commanded I bare my flesh, and I obeyed. I will not always obey the Ring-Yew. [In the Season of Ambitions, this can upgrade your Change desire.]

elements.label: Integument, Surrendered
elements.description:
The Mother pierces, the Witch demands, the Sister dissolves. And so
 my skin
 is thin
 as rain

elements.label: Steps, Surrendered
elements.description: I walked in the black-flax at the river's edge, and it tasted my feet with its hundred tongues until I could withstand the touch of it no longer, and then I was only shadow.

elements.label: Hues, Surrendered
elements.description: I came to the flowers the flower-maker made and that is what I became. He keeps my colours for me now.

elements.label: Sight, Surrendered
elements.description: The Centipede told me her jokes and in exchange I will let her carve me eyes of gold, until the ommatidia occur.

elements.label: Bones, Surrendered
elements.description: The Sun was divided, and the Wolf will not let me forget the salt savour of its bones - not until the Mansus cracks. Now the Wolf requires that I carry that savour through the Door in the Wood.
